# ElectroProject

So far, the objects presented are build to operate on a single recording session.
However, projects usually contains several recording sessions.
The ElectroProject is a class that represents you projects.
It contains a useful method to join data from the single recording sessions into a single dataset.

## Create a ElectroProject object

You can create an `ElectroProject` object with the `new()` function. 

```{r EP_create}
library(relectro)

```

## ElectroProject Methods
List the methods of the ElectroProject class
```{R EPMethods}
methods(class=ElectroProject)
```
